using {ProjectName}.Core.Contracts.Aggregates.{Pluralize}.Commands;
using {ProjectName}.Core.Contracts.Aggregates.{Pluralize}.Queries.GetAll;
using {ProjectName}.Core.Contracts.Aggregates.{Pluralize}.Queries.ResultViewModel;
using {ProjectName}.Endpoints.API.Controllers;

using FluentResults;

using MDF.Framework.Extensions.Results;

using MediatR;

using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http;
using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc;

using Moq;

namespace {ProjectName}.Endpoints.API.Tests.Unit.Controllers;
#error This file is generated by AutoMDF. This file must be edited before use. Delete this line when editing is complete.
public class {Singular}ControllerTests
{
	private readonly Mock<IMediator> _mediatorMock;
	private readonly {Singular}Controller _{SingularVar}Controller;

	public {Singular}ControllerTests()
	{
		_mediatorMock = new Mock<IMediator>();
		_{SingularVar}Controller = new {Singular}Controller(_mediatorMock.Object);
	}

	[Fact]
	public async Task ShouldBe_ReturnsListOf{Pluralize}_When_CallGetAll{Singular}AsyncMethod()
	{
		// Arrange
		var expected{Pluralize} = new List<{Singular}QueryResult>
							{
								new {Singular}QueryResult { Id = Guid.CreateVersion7(), {Singular}Title = "{Singular} 1" },
								new {Singular}QueryResult { Id = Guid.CreateVersion7(), {Singular}Title = "{Singular} 2" }
							};

		_mediatorMock.Setup(m => m.Send(It.IsAny<GetAll{Singular}Query>(), It.IsAny<CancellationToken>()))
			.ReturnsAsync(expected{Pluralize});

		// Act
		var result = await _{SingularVar}Controller.GetAll{Singular}Async();

		// Assert
		var okResult = Assert.IsType<OkObjectResult>(result);
		var actual{Pluralize} = Assert.IsType<CustomResult<List<{Singular}QueryResult>>>(okResult.Value);
		Assert.Equal(StatusCodes.Status200OK, okResult.StatusCode);
		Assert.Equal(expected{Pluralize}, actual{Pluralize}.Value);
	}

}
